record.dc:title: 94HY14 Work Farm Site 16HY14, Obion Mound, Henry Co., TN. Summit A. Feature 3, Open corner, almost square, wall trench and post hole pattern. Floor and some of the burned daub which covered the approximate center of the structure shows to the left. Sq. 69L3. Direction from north.
record.wpa:narrative: In the left foreground are one pottery trowel and two celts. In the upper left are some dendro specimens. Good structure. The Northeast corner was partially destroyed by summit removal before the true extent of the structure was suspected.
